Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventHandler.html#.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventHandler.html#.abstract: Adds the given SwitchWidgetEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventHandler.html#.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventHandler.html#.abstract: Removes the given SwitchWidgetEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventListener.html.name: onSwitchWidget(newWidgetId:)
Protocols/SwitchWidgetEventListener.html.abstract: The switchWidget event is triggered when the visitor has selected a value from the available dropdown list options. It will return the value of the newWidgetId.

Protocols/StartChatEventHandler.html#/s:.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/StartChatEventHandler.html#/s:.abstract: Adds the given StartChatEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/StartChatEventHandler.html#/s:.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/StartChatEventHandler.html#/s:.abstract: Removes the given StartChatEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/StartChatEventListener.html#/c.name: onStartChat(email:message:type:)
Protocols/StartChatEventListener.html#/c.abstract: The StartChat event is fired when the visitor starts a chat, or responds to a proactive invitation.

Protocols/StartCallmeEventHandler.html#/.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/StartCallmeEventHandler.html#/.abstract: Adds the given StartCallmeEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/StartCallmeEventHandler.html#/.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/StartCallmeEventHandler.html#/.abstract: Removes the given StartCallmeEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/StartCallmeEventListener.html#.name: onStartCallme(phone:)
Protocols/StartCallmeEventListener.html#.abstract: The StartCallMe event is fired when the visitor starts a call-me.

Protocols/OpenProactiveEventHandler.html.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/OpenProactiveEventHandler.html.abstract: Adds the given ButtonEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/OpenProactiveEventHandler.html.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/OpenProactiveEventHandler.html.abstract: Removes the given ButtonEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/OpenProactiveEventListener.htm.name: onOpenProactive(agent:message:)
Protocols/OpenProactiveEventListener.htm.abstract: The OpenProactive event is fired when the proactive chat is displayed to a visitor. (Note, when the visitor replies, the StartChat even/// fires.)

Protocols/OpenEventHandler.html#/s:13Sna.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/OpenEventHandler.html#/s:13Sna.abstract: Adds the given OpenEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/OpenEventHandler.html#/s:13Sna.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/OpenEventHandler.html#/s:13Sna.abstract: Removes the given OpenEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/OpenEventListener.html#/c:@M@S.name: onOpen(status:)
Protocols/OpenEventListener.html#/c:@M@S.abstract: The Open event is fired when the chat form is opened. The form may be opened by the user directly (button click), or as the result of an API call.

Protocols/OnReadyEventHandler.html#/s:13.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/OnReadyEventHandler.html#/s:13.abstract: Adds the given OnReadyEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/OnReadyEventHandler.html#/s:13.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/OnReadyEventHandler.html#/s:13.abstract: Removes the given OnReadyEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/OnReadyEventListener.html#/c:@.name: onReady()
Protocols/OnReadyEventListener.html#/c:@.abstract: onReady events fires when the chat loaded and ready to use

Protocols/MinimizeEventHandler.html#/s:1.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/MinimizeEventHandler.html#/s:1.abstract: Adds the given MinimizeEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/MinimizeEventHandler.html#/s:1.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/MinimizeEventHandler.html#/s:1.abstract: Removes the given MinimizeEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/MinimizeEventListener.html#/c:.name: onMinimize(isMinimized:chatType:boxType:)
Protocols/MinimizeEventListener.html#/c:.abstract: The Minimize event is triggered when the visitor clicks the minimize icon in the chat box, or during live and active chats when they click on the minimized ‘button’ to maximize the chat box.

Protocols/MessageSubmitEventHandler.html.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/MessageSubmitEventHandler.html.abstract: Adds the given MessageSubmitEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/MessageSubmitEventHandler.html.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/MessageSubmitEventHandler.html.abstract: Removes the given MessageSubmitEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/MessageSubmitEventListener.htm.name: onMessageSubmit(email:message:)
Protocols/MessageSubmitEventListener.htm.abstract: The MessageSubmit event is fired when the visitor submits an offline message (not a chat message).

Protocols/CloseEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/CloseEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.abstract: Adds the given CloseEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/CloseEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/CloseEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.abstract: Removes the given CloseEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/CloseEventListener.html#/c:@M@.name: onClose(type:status:)
Protocols/CloseEventListener.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The Close event is fired when a close button is clicked.

Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventHandler.ht.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventHandler.ht.abstract: Adds the given ChatMessageSentEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventHandler.ht.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventHandler.ht.abstract: Removes the given ChatMessageSentEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventListener.h.name: onChatMessageSent(message:)
Protocols/ChatMessageSentEventListener.h.abstract: The ChatMessageSent event is fired when the visitor submits a chat message while in the chat session.

Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventHandle.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventHandle.abstract: Adds the given ChatMessageReceivedEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventHandle.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventHandle.abstract: Removes the given ChatMessageReceivedEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventListen.name: onChatMessageReceived(agent:message:)
Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventListen.abstract: The ChatMessageReceived event is fired when a message from the agent is received by the visitor.

Protocols/ButtonEventHandler.html#/s:13S.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/ButtonEventHandler.html#/s:13S.abstract: Adds the given ButtonEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/ButtonEventHandler.html#/s:13S.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/ButtonEventHandler.html#/s:13S.abstract: Removes the given ButtonEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/ButtonEventListener.html#/c:@M.name: onButton(options:)
Protocols/ButtonEventListener.html#/c:@M.abstract: The InlineButtonClicked event is fired when the visitor clicks on messages that are buttons.

Protocols/ErrorEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.name: add(listener:)
Protocols/ErrorEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.abstract: Adds the given ErrorEventListener to this handler.

Protocols/ErrorEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.name: remove(listener:)
Protocols/ErrorEventHandler.html#/s:13Sn.abstract: Removes the given ErrorEventListener from this handler.

Protocols/ErrorEventListener.html#/c:@M@.name: onError(error:)
Protocols/ErrorEventListener.html#/c:@M@.abstract: onError event is fired, when an error happened, for example when the SDK couldn’t load the chat

Protocols/Chat.html.name: Chat
Protocols/Chat.html.abstract: Protocol, that summarizes the public API of the ChatView

Protocols/ChatMessageReceivedEventHandle.abstract: Abstraction of the chat message received event handler.

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: bridge
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: This dictionary describes which eventHandler is responsible for a javaScript message

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: pendingActions
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: The JavaScript actions are stored in this array, until the chat is ready, then they are executed

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: isReady
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: This variable represents that the chat has been loaded and ready to evaluate javascripts.

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: isWebViewTransparent
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: When this variable is true, the SDK sets the underlying webview’s isOpaque to false, and backgroundColor to clear

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: checkWidgetAvailability(widgetId:completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: You can get the status of the widget

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: setConfiguration(_:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Setter to load a specific configuration to this View.

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: startLink(completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Shows the chat view, when the view is ready.

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: showButton(completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Show the chat button, when the view is ready.

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: hideButton(completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Hides the chat button, when the view is ready.

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: reload()
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Reloads the chat with the current configuration, sets the isReady property to false

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.name: clearAllCookies(completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@M@SnapEngageSD.abstract: Clears the cookies, when the view is ready.

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: commonInit()
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: This method is called by both initializers

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: setupBridge(config:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: It registers every eventHandler to the webView

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: setupWebView(config:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: It configures the webView for the desired behaviour

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: load(with:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: It loads the chat with the given configuration

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: runOrSaveJavaScriptOnProvider(script:completion:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: If the chat is ready, it runs a javaScript on the chat.

Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.name: runPendingActions()
Classes/ChatView.html#/s:13SnapEngageSDK.abstract: It’s called when the chat is ready, and runs the pending actions

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.name: webView(_:didFail:withError:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.name: webView(_:decidePolicyFor:decisionHandler:)
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.name: onReady()
Classes/ChatView.html#/c:@CM@SnapEngageS.abstract: It’s called when the JavaScript loaded successfully, sets the isReady to true, and runs the pending actions

Classes/ChatView.html.name: ChatView
Classes/ChatView.html.abstract: ChatView - Wrapper view that hides the real implementation from the user and prevent to do any change on it.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
